p1: You should give us this claim reference number if you contact us about your claim.

whatNext.p1: If we approve %s’s claim, we’ll pay the money into the bank account they chose.
whatNext.p2: If we do not approve the claim, we’ll contact %s to let them know what to do next.
whatNext.p3: %s can see the progress of their claim in their claims history.

feedback.link: What did you think of this service?
